Text: Find more of whats inside NYTimescomBreaking news around the clock insight from awardwinning journalists online resources exclusive features and much more This is the second and last email introducing you to the features of our site Dear NYTimescom Member As a new member of our community we want to make sure that youre not only enjoying our site but that youre also making the most of it Did you know that NYTimescom is constantly updating and improving and there are even more new and useful features available to you Here are just some of the features you may not know about Todays Headlines Have daily breaking news from top New York Times sections delivered right to your inbox In one concise email you can choose the number of headlines you want to receive from any or all of the major sections of NYTimescom You can even choose the time of day you want to receive your headlines Customize your Todays Headlines now servicesemailemailhtml Weekly Newsletters Youve got the whole New York Times at your disposal Pick the sections you want Well deliver them right to your inbox TRAVEL DISPATCH Get a jump on special travel deals plus an early look at the Sunday Travel section of The New York Times YOUR MONEY Stay on top of your personal finances with analysis information and a look ahead to the weeks major business events CIRCUITS Plug into whats hot in digital technology And get a glimpse into the future with panel discussions about the Next Big Things ADVERTISING Which ad campaigns sizzle Which are throwing smoke And why Stuart Elliott provides weekly insight with his mustread column For these and a wide selection of other exclusive newsletters go to servicesemailemailhtml THE NEW YORK TIMES ARCHIVE Over half a million articles on demand The Archive houses over articles dating back to You can get articles published within the past week free and purchase older articles for as little as per article Pricing options include articles for articles for and articles for and single article for archives CROSSWORDS In case you missed it heres a second chance for you to enjoy our Premium Crosswords FREE for days For you can enjoy them all year longwith unlimited access to todays New York Times puzzle and over archived daily including both Sunday puzzles from the Magazine and our acrostic puzzles freepuzzles Theres something new with every visit Indepth exposes live streaming video and audio webcasts resource guides and much more Make a point of stopping by often Every day youll find something exciting and different Heres whats running right now Aids at Our comprehensive world report discusses where we are where were going and where we need to be Summer Living Guide From blockbuster films to home grill recipes weve got the season covered Live fashion shows Get you within an arms length of the worlds catwalks Live streaming audio Tune in to NYTimescom for the best in classical music streaming live Thanks again for becoming a member We hope youll make a point of visiting us often Sincerely New York Times on the Web PS Heres a great idea submitted by one of our members bookmark our Navigator Guide When youre looking for information Navigator the home page of The New York Times newsroom is a great starting point it even provides regularly updated lists of useful Websites librarytechreferencecynavihtmlwelcome ABOUT THIS EMAIL This is the second and final introductory email you will receive As a member of the BBBOnline Privacy Program and the TRUSTe privacy program we are committed to protecting your privacy Please do not reply directly to this email you may contact us at

Find more of whats inside NYTimescomHpst Dear NYTimescom Member Thanks again for joining our community This is the second and last email introducing you to the features of our site We hope that you are finding NYTimescom to be an excellent source of insightful news coverage indepth analysis and the best in arts and entertainment But we also know there are new and useful features on NYTimescom that may not be immediately evident on our home page Here are some of them Choose from a wide selection of exclusive daily email newsletters Have daily breaking news alerts and daily headline summaries from major sections delivered to your in box Or select from weekly updates on the latest in books or movies get information on personal finance with Your Money the latest on digital technology with Circuits or an early look at the Travel section of Sundays Times and travel deals with Travel Dispatch Sign up now for these and other newsletters emailemailjspcub Search the past week of articles from major news sections free of charge searchcub Bookmark our Navigator guide for a regularly updated list of some of the most useful sites on the Web When youre looking for information Navigator the home page of the newsroom of The New York Times is a great starting point librarytechreferencecynavihtmlcub In case you missed it here is a second opportunity for you to access our Premium Crosswords FREE for days Premium Crossword subscribers have access to todays New York Times puzzle and over crossword puzzles for a annual fee Click here to enjoy days free freepuzzlescub Thanks again for your interest in NYTimescom To comment on any aspect of our site or services feel free to write to us at We hope youll make a point of visiting us today and every day Sincerely Bernard Gwertzman Editor New York Times Digital ABOUT THIS EMAIL This is the second and final introductory email you will receive As a member of the BBBOnline Privacy Program and the TRUSTe privacy program we are committed to protecting your privacy Please send comments to do not reply directly to this e mail
